page.title: 12A Day in the Life of a Miner
page.content: It is six in the morning,time to go to work.I walked through the gates of the colliery.I had to go and get my kit and then clock on and and get my lamp. Looking at the B 20 board,I saw my name.I was going to work at a face two miles from the shaft.My kit consisted of an orange overall,light,helmet and fire damp detector.Thirteen men walked into the cage with me.I fixed the lamp to my helmet and proceeded down the rough passage way.It takes one hour of walking to get to the face. I worked underground for seven and a half hours.Before leaving,I check my fire damp detector.It was fine. On the surface,I made my way to the lamp room and then clocked off.After my shower,I said a farewell to the colliery and left.
